<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="aboutUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source=""/>
	<e:Image width="100%" y="0" height="100%" x="0" source=""/>
	<e:Button id="btnClose" horizontalCenter="-18" verticalCenter="0" label=" 关闭">
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label multiline="true" text="开发商：白鹭时代\n版本号：1.0\n使用Egret引擎开发" 
	         size="18" width="173" height="102" fontFamily="微软雅黑"
	         stroke="1" strokeColor="0"  horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-75"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ActionMenuUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="248" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="true">
		<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="frame_dianjikongdi_s1_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lbInfo" text="x, y" y="174" textAlign="center" right="0" left="0" size="16" strokeColor="0x161111" stroke="2" textColor="0x377a16" alpha="0.8"/>
		<e:Group height="113" y="35" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false" x="188">
			<e:Button id="btnBack" label="" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="frame_dianjikongdi_s2_png" source.down="frame_dianjikongdi_s2_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Image y="22" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="0" source="icon_dianjikongdi_guanbi_s1_png"/>
			<e:Label text="关闭" y="69" size="19" stroke="1" strokeColor="0x161111" textColor="0xFFF4D7" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group height="113" y="35" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false" x="-40">
			<e:Button id="btnAction" label="" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="frame_dianjikongdi_s2_png" source.down="frame_dianjikongdi_s2_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Image y="15" source="icon_dianjikongdi_chuzheng_s3_png" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Label text="出征" y="69" size="19" stroke="1" strokeColor="0x161111" textColor="0xfff4d7" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group height="113" y="-44" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false" x="75">
			<e:Button id="btnBuild" label="" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="frame_dianjikongdi_s2_png" source.down="frame_dianjikongdi_s2_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Image y="15" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="0" source="icon_dianjikongdi_jianzao_s2_png"/>
			<e:Label text="建造" y="69" size="19" stroke="1" strokeColor="0x161111" textColor="0xFFF4D7" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="AnimationUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="start">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{btnClose}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="1000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{254}" y="{356}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source=""/>
	<e:Image width="100%" y="0" height="100%" x="0" source=""/>
	<e:Button id="btnClose" label="动画测试" x="252" y="543">
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label multiline="true" text="UI动画测试，具体看Animt类的使用" 
	         size="18" width="173" height="102" fontFamily="微软雅黑"
	         stroke="1" strokeColor="0"  horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-75"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ArmyMoveListIRSkin" width="610" height="250" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="up,down">
	<e:Group id="gpTap" width="100%" height="100%" y="0" x="0">
		<e:Image x="1.34" y="-1.67" source="chuzheng_frame_buduichuzheng_s1_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Group width="133" height="42" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
			<e:Image x="16" y="9" source="chuzheng_icon_buduichuzheng_s3_png" width="56" height="48"/>
			<e:Label id="armyName" x="87.33" y="24.33" size="26" text="{data.armyName}" textColor="0xe3d2c6" stroke="3" strokeColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image x="20.5" verticalCenter="31" source="{data.icon}"/>
		<e:Label text="部队兵力" x="219" y="81.67" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Label text="部队速度" x="219" y="114" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Label text="行军距离" x="219" y="176" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Label text="预计时间" x="219" y="206.99" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Label text="当前状态" x="219" y="145" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Label text="{data.strength}" x="344" y="81.67" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Label text="{data.speed}" x="344" y="114" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Label text="{data.status}" x="344" y="145" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Label text="{data.dis}" x="344" y="176" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Label text="{data.time}" x="344" y="206.99" size="23" textColor="0x3c2d28"/>
		<e:Image x="514" source="chuzheng_frame_buduichuzheng_s2_png" width="57" height="57" y="130"/>
		<e:CheckBox id="checkBox" x="514" selected="false" label="" enabled="true" y="130">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chuzheng_frame_buduichuzheng_s2_png" source.down="chuzheng_icon_buduichuzheng_s2_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:CheckBox>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="ArmyMove.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="camp_bt_fuyong_s1_png"
             source.down="camp_bt_fuyong_s1_png" scale9Grid="4,4,24,24"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ArmyMoveUISkin" width="720" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ui="ui.*">
	<e:Group width="660" height="950" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" anchorOffsetY="200">
		<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="camp_bg_fuyong_1_png" scale9Grid="23,23,140,140"/>
		<e:Image x="0" y="0" source="camp_headline_fuyong_S1_png" width="660"/>
		<e:Scroller width="610" height="770" enabled="true" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:List id="lstArmy" height="100%" y="-26" x="1" width="100%" itemRenderer="ui.ArmyMoveItem" itemRendererSkinName="ArmyMoveListIRSkin">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Button id="btnClose" label="" right="0" scaleX="0.9" scaleY="0.9" y="2">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:ns1="*">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="camp_bt_close_png" source.down="camp_bt_close_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="btnOK" label="" right="25" scaleX="0.9" scaleY="0.9" skinName="ArmyMove.ButtonSkin" width="140" height="60" bottom="9">
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label text="确认" x="543" y="900" size="28" stroke="3" touchEnabled="false" strokeColor="0x3c2d28"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BuildTimeProgress" width="113" height="16" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="113"
			 height="16" verticalCenter="0" scale9Grid="30,5,79,4" source="profress_jianzuxuanzhong_s2_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="12" width="109" source="profress_jianzuxuanzhong_s1_png" y="2" x="2" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BuildingProgress" width="134" height="14" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">

			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0" source="frame_jianzuxuanzhong_s7_png" scale9Grid="20,6,97,2"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="6" width="126" source="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s11_png" y="4" x="4"/>

			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BuildMenuUISkin" width="720" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="gpMainPos" width="200" height="200" x="364.5" y="445.5" touchEnabled="false" anchorOffsetX="100" anchorOffsetY="100">
		<e:Image source="frame_jianzuxuanzhong_s3_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Group width="146" height="17" x="36.5" y="-56.5" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:ProgressBar width="113" height="16" x="25" y="2" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" value="100" skinName="BuildTimeProgress"/>
			<e:Label id="lbBuildTime" text="12:00:00" y="-20" textAlign="center" size="22" stroke="2" alpha="1" touchEnabled="false" x="34" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textColor="0xFFFEF2" width="97"/>
			<e:Image x="-10" y="-14" touchEnabled="false" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s2_png"/>
			<e:Image x="-10" y="-15" touchEnabled="false" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s1_png"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="200" height="17" x="32" y="-21" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:ProgressBar width="134" height="14" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" value="100" skinName="BuildingProgress"/>
			<e:Label id="lbBlood" text="1000/1000" y="0" textAlign="center" size="15" stroke="2" alpha="1" touchEnabled="false" x="130" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textColor="0xfffef2" width="97"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group left="0" bottom="0" top="0" right="0" touchEnabled="false" cacheAsBitmap="false">
		<e:Image source="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s2_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="335" height="160" scale9Grid="9,11,16,20" touchEnabled="false" bottom="312" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Group id="gpAnchor" height="160" touchEnabled="false" width="335" x="168" bottom="326">
			<e:Label id="lbTitle" text="指挥中心  (LV6)" y="37" textAlign="center" size="23" stroke="3" alpha="1" touchEnabled="false" x="119"/>
			<e:Image x="84" y="78" source="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s9_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
			<e:Image x="77" y="126" source="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s10_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
			<e:Label id="lbPos" text="(999,999)" x="116" y="81" size="23" textColor="0xfff288"/>
			<e:Label id="lbState" text="升级中" x="119" y="132" size="23" textColor="0x78cc94"/>
			<e:Button id="btnLocation" label="" x="230" y="72" width="47">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s12_png" source.down="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s13_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="btnShare" label="" x="282" y="72">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s7_png" source.down="pic_jianzuxuanzhong_s8_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="200" height="200" x="155" bottom="90">
			<e:Group width="160" height="173" x="17.24" y="0" touchEnabled="false" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
				<e:Button id="btnFunc" label="" x="0" y="0">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="frame_jianzuxuanzhong_s5_png" source.down="frame_jianzuxuanzhong_s5_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
				</e:Button>
